body: Burning Flash (Fire), Decipher* (Language), Fade (Concealing), Fog Bank (Weather), Force Shield (Armor), Friendship (Command), Glide (Flight), Lesser Cure (Healing), Lesser Wound (Wounding), Nature's Calm (Animal), Radiance (Illumination), Servitor I (Summoning), Shock Arc (Electricity), Simple Order (Command), Soothing Touch* (Healing), Spook (Fear), Wrack (Pain)
